channel.title: Comments on: Switzerland without the skis

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/switzerland-without-the-skis/#comment-233933">Paul</a>.
Hi Paul,
I was actually on a media trip organised by Swiss Tourism, so I didn't book any of the tours myself. It would be easy to organise all of this yourself though - just go the tourism info centre of each village and ask them to help you book the activities. Have fun!
Sarah
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Paul.

Hi Paul,

I was actually on a media trip organised by Swiss Tourism, so I didn’t book any of the tours myself. It would be easy to organise all of this yourself though – just go the tourism info centre of each village and ask them to help you book the activities. Have fun!

Sarah

item.title: By: Paul
item.dc:creator: Paul
item.description:
Hey Sarah,
Just found this blog as I am looking to goto Switzerland for New year for upto a week. Can you let me know did you go here alone and book the tours each day etc or did you book it all in one tour please??
Thanks
Paul
item.content:encoded:
Hey Sarah,

Just found this blog as I am looking to goto Switzerland for New year for upto a week. Can you let me know did you go here alone and book the tours each day etc or did you book it all in one tour please??

Thanks

Paul

item.title: By: colin
item.dc:creator: colin
item.description: I remember Schilthorn mountain, what a day we had playing Bond Villains rolling around in the snow, thanks for the memory blast.
item.content:encoded: I remember Schilthorn mountain, what a day we had playing Bond Villains rolling around in the snow, thanks for the memory blast.

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:

Thanks Karin!

item.title: By: Karin Duncker

item.description: What an accomplished wordsmith you are. Love it.
item.content:encoded: What an accomplished wordsmith you are. Love it.

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/switzerland-without-the-skis/#comment-410">Chandler</a>.
Thanks Chandler! That photo was from Hotel Alpenruh in Murren - my favourite balcony view of the trip :)
